resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107353</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107353</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207226</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Brain: Understanding Neurobiology Through the Study of Addiction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Gehirn: Verstehende Neurobiologie durch 
die Studie der Neigung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Cerveau : Neurobiologie d'arrangement 
par l'étude du penchant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Cérebro: Neurobiology compreensivo com o 
estudo do addiction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Cervello: Neurobiologia capente con lo 
studio su aggiunta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο εγκέφαλος: Κατανόηση της νευροβιολογίας μέσω 
της μελέτης του εθισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Cerebro: Neurobiología que entiende con 
el estudio del apego</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">helps students discover the fundamentals of neurobiology and how drugs change the brain. Among the topics: functions of specific brain areas; anatomy of the neuron; neurotransmission; drug action on neurons; genetic, behavioral, and environmental influences on drug addiction; and addiction as a chronic disease.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hilfen Kursteilnehmer entdecken die Grundlagen von
Neurobiologie und wie Drogen das Gehirn ändern. Unter den 
Themen: Funktionen der spezifischen Gehirnbereiche; 
Anatomie des Neurons; Neurotransmission; 
Drogetätigkeit auf Neuronen; genetische, Verhaltens- und 
Klimaeinflüsse auf Drogenabhängigkeit; und Neigung als 
chronische Krankheit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants d'aides découvrent les principes 
fondamentaux de la neurobiologie et comment les drogues changent le 
cerveau. Parmi les sujets : fonctions des zones 
spécifiques de cerveau ; anatomie du neurone ; 
neurotransmission ; action de drogue sur des neurones ; 
influences génétiques, comportementales, et environnementales 
sur le penchant de drogue ; et penchant comme maladie chronique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os estudantes das ajudas descobrem os fundamentos 
do neurobiology e como as drogas mudam o cérebro. Entre os 
tópicos: funções de áreas específicas do cérebro; 
anatomy do neurônio; neurotransmission; ação da 
droga nos neurônios; influências genetic, behavioral, e 
ambientais no addiction de droga; e addiction como uma doença 
crônica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gli allievi di aiuti scoprono i fondamenti della 
neurobiologia e come le droghe cambiano il cervello. Fra i 
soggetti: funzioni delle zone specifiche del cervello; 
anatomia del neurone; neurotrasmissione; azione 
della droga sui neuroni; influenze genetiche, del comportamento 
ed ambientali su aggiunta di droga; ed aggiunta come malattia 
cronica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βοηθά τους σπουδαστές να ανακαλύψουν τις βασικές 
αρχές της νευροβιολογίας και πώς τα φάρμακα αλλάζουν τον 
εγκέφαλο. Μεταξύ των θεμάτων: λειτουργίες των 
συγκεκριμένων περιοχών εγκεφάλου  ανατομία του νευρώνα  
νευροδιαβίβαση  ενέργεια φαρμάκων στους νευρώνες  
γενετικές, συμπεριφοριστικές, και περιβαλλοντικές επιρροές 
στον εθισμό φαρμάκων  και εθισμός ως χρόνια πάθηση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los estudiantes de las ayudas descubren los 
fundamentales de la neurobiología y cómo las drogas cambian el 
cerebro. Entre los asuntos: funciones de las áreas 
específicas del cerebro; anatomía de la neurona; 
neurotransmisión; acción de la droga en las neuronas; 
influencias genéticas, del comportamiento, y ambientales en el 
apego de droga; y apego como enfermedad crónica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207226</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107353</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-brain-understanding-neurobiology-through-the-study-of-addiction</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
